mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Reverend Dr. G. Ousley Brown shaking the hand of Reverend Dr. Bernard Braskamp
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reverend Dr. G. Ousley Brown, left, pastor of the Cove United Presbyterian Church (Weirton), shaking the hand of Reverend Dr. Bernard Braskamp, chaplain of the House of Representatives, as Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr. looks on.
